page.title: 15A Village School Day
page.content: My name is Jennifer Lee and I am eight years old. On Monday morning my mum got me up at half past seven. She got me some cereal for breakfast and then I cleaned my teeth and got changed. Then I walked up to school and said goodbye to mum. Just after I got in the bell rang for us to start lessons. First I read when I got into class and then I did some handwriting and then I gave in my savings money. After that it was time for assembly and after that it was spellings. We did some writing as well. After that it was dinner. We had fish cakes,chips and baked beans for dinner. After dinner we had playtime and then we went swimming before we went home. After school I went to the dentist and had my tea. After tea I did a jigsaw puzzle,watched the television and went to bed at half past nine.
